plot: Captain Grief was a South Sea Trader and his adventures aboard his boat, "The Rattler" was based on stories by adventure writer Jack London.
plot_en: Captain Grief was a South Sea Trader and his adventures aboard his boat, "The Rattler" was based on stories by adventure writer Jack London.
plot_es: Captain Grief was a South Sea Trader and his adventures aboard his boat, "The Rattler" was based on stories by adventure writer Jack London.
title: Captain David Grief
